meta.title: Mr. Mizo - Beautiful Handmade Things!
meta.keywords: Handmade, Mizo, Crochet, Hand knit, Mittens, Blankets, Socks
meta.author: Mr. Mizo

about.heading: Welcome to Mr. Mizo
content: You will find here crochet baby blankets, wool mittens, alpaca pouches and I hope many more items in the near future.

Each item in my shop is unique and I hope I can keep it that way. They are designed and made by me in the little free time I have. I am trying to use as natural yarns as possible. If you have any question don't hesitate to convo me.
